nodes.text: Heir to the Empire: Behind the Scenes - an Expanded Universe Is Born

Heir to the Empire: Behind the Scenes - an Expanded Universe Is Born is a companion audio download released alongside the print and audio editions of Heir to the Empire: The 20th Anniversary Edition. It contains commentary from Zahn and editor Betsy Mitchell about the process of writing the Thrawn Trilogy interspersed with excerpts from the new unabridged audio adaptation.
